russian_roulette.description: A game of chance. 50% chance of winning and doubling your held money, 50% chance of losing and losing all your money.

vat_of_urine.description: So this is what DOOM meant..

scary_mask.description: It's scary, right? Lowers your chance of being robbed, does not stack. (Passive Item)

golden_pan.description: A legendary item, if bought guarantees buyer bragging rights.

inf_money_glitch.description: devs forgot to patch this LOL, 100% working 2007

hiden_codex.description: I like what this book is whispering to me.
